body: So virgin guy gets a mega slut. Japan has odd fetishes.

This is a vanilla story. Male MC is a virgin and has been sex deprived till the state that he looks for prostitution. He was scouted to join an exclusive sex club where female MC happens to be a member there. She recognised him immediately and called out to him being emotionless at work, but can actually shows emotions. Once he realised who she is, he gave his all to satisfy his urge for her as she has been one of his sexual frustration during work. But he broke the rules of the club by revealing her identity when he finally confessed his love to her and caused the both of them to be exempted from the club forever. In the end she accepted his love while holding his hand and asking whether his confession during the club is truly from his heart.
Not a clue but I'm curious?
